text: C.A. Peñarol is a football club which plays in Uruguay. They were the South American club of the 20th century, chosen by the IFFHS. == Honors == * Copa Libertadores - 5 * Intercontinental Cup - 3 == Names == * 1891-1913 - Central Uruguay Railway Cricket Club * 1913-present - Club Atlético Peñarol == References == Category:Football clubs in Montevideo Category:1891 establishments in South America Category:19th-century establishments in Uruguay
title: Peñarol
